|brand = RPF |model = Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = CM4104032 |page_start_date = 11/01/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Raspberry_Pi_Compute_Module_4_(CM4104032) |wlclass = AC600 |series = RPi-CM4 |type = SoM, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ABCB-RPICM4, 2ABCB-RPIRM0 |icid = 20953-RPIRM0 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2711;BCM2711;BCM2711ZP; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMBG2JETD-B041; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F8E304HM-MGCJ; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54210PE; |lan_ports = <!-- 4, --> |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0 (BLE) |addchip = 5 Output Universal PMIC;MaxLinear (Exar);MxL7704;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/03/2020 |estreldate = 10/2020 |estprice = 65 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIVAMDJ4T1686 |asin = B09NRCYT21 |asin_country = CA |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = UK
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = RFP Raspberry Pi RPi-RM0 |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4" and "Made in the UK" are silkscreened on board top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A72) *GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore VI @500MHz :OpenGL ES 3.1, Vulkan 1.0, :H.265 (HEVC) (up to 4Kp60 decode), :H.264 (up to 1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Cypress]] CYW43455 :802.11abgn/ac (1T1R), BT 5.0 (BLE) *Network: 1x GbE port via connectors *Power Source: 5V via connectors
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/19/raspberry-pi-cm4-cm4lite-modules/ ''Raspberry Pi CM4 and CM4Lite Modules Launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/raspberry-pi-cm4-launches-with-smaller-footprint-quad-a72-cpu-and-optional-wifi/''Raspberry Pi CM4 launches with smaller footprint'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Raspberry Pi CM4 (CM4104032) Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:Raspberry Pi CM4 (CM4104032) Bottom.jpeg|SoM Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
